title: Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument: Professional Development
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Professional Development               Professional Development       Graduate credit through Adam's State University or recertification credits through BOCES are available to teachers through the Summer Seminar Series. The Summer Seminars Series are one-day workshops that take place on weekends throughout the summer. They are sponsored by the Friends of the Florissant Fossil Beds, Inc.
